Notes: Company is plan administrator. Penalty amount reported in range of $50,001 to $100,000.

Agency: Office of the Comptroller of the Currency

Description: Bannockburn Global was ordered to pay a $500,000 penalty in an order finding that it provided money transmission services in California without a license.
Agency: California Department of Financial Protection and Innovation

Description: Bannockburn Global Forex agreed to pay a $146,000 civil penalty in settlement of allegations it engaged in mortgage-related business in the state without the correct licensing.
Agency: Michigan Department of Insurance and Financial Services
